SMART SOCCER is the new, revolutionary app for soccer training and coaching.

The concept of Smart Soccer is to optimize the training sessions and make them more effective. It includes over 450 advanced exercises (each one including a detailed description and an illustration) that you can extend with your own notes and additions to make it even more effective and personalized.

The Smart Soccer exercises are divided in 8 categories: Analytical Exercises, Situational Exercises, Games Start, Themed Games, Ball Possession, Athletic, Position & Tactical Drills.

The Analytical are special exercises meant to recreate real match situations, but with slight tactical and technical modifications, and without opponents.

Games Start exercises are useful in the first years of soccer school, and allow kinds to learn the basic principles of technique and individual tactics, and to ease the development of coordination abilities. They can also be used by adults as warming-up exercises.

Situational Exercises are specific exercises that are closer to real match conditions, and require at least one player, an opponent, and a game direction.

Themed games are real matches with special rules, created to enhance technical and tactical learning and development of smart in-game thinking. They can be used effectively with kids and adults. 

Ball Possession are really helpful exercises, in which 2 or more teams challenge for ball possession. This kind of exercise improves individual techinque, team tactics, and the ability to analize game situations.

More features of Smart Soccer include:
 
- Write your own exercises and store them in the app
- Add a photo to your personalized exercise
- 100% offline availability. You can access all the data without an internet connection.
- Multilanguage: all the exercises are available in english and italian
- Create your own training sessions combining your favorite exercises. 
- Add your personal notes  to each exercise.
- Free updates: We will add new exercises preiodically at no cost

Volleyball scoreboard that simple and easy to use .
Team names can be entered.

● How to use
1. Adding points
Tap the top of the score to add points.

2. Point deduction
Tap the "-" icon to deduct points.
Use this when you have added points by mistake.

3. Coat Change
Tap the "Court Change" button to reverse the score.

4. Reset
Tap "Reset Game" button to reset the score.

5. Change Team Name
Tap the team name to change the name.

6. Serve indicator.
When the setting is turned on, the ball icon will be displayed on the score of the team that scored the point.  For now, it is not supported when points are deducted (when the minus button is tapped). If the team that has the right to serve is wrong, you can replace them by tapping the ball icon in the middle of the screen.

7. Save the game results.
You can choose whether or not to save the game record when the game is reset. The maximum number of game records that can be saved is 10; if the number exceeds 10, the oldest record will be deleted and a new game result will be registered. To view the game record, swipe the scoreboard to the left or right.
